```{r}
library(stringr)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)

genre = read.csv("data/genre.csv")
movie = read.csv("data/movie_metadata_filtered.csv")

genre_matrix = matrix(0,
                    nrow=dim(movie)[1],
                    ncol=dim(genre)[1])
colnames(genre_matrix)= genre$genres

for(i in 1:dim(genre)[1]){
genre_matrix[,i] =genre_matrix[,i] + 
  str_detect(movie$genres,pattern = as.character(genre[i,1]))
}

```
